title: Multiplexed inkjet functionalization of silicon photonic biosensors
authors: Kirk, JT; Fridley, GE; Chamberlain, JW; Christensen, E; Hochberg, M; Ratner, DM

title: Inferring sleep stage from local field potentials recorded in the subthalamic nucleus of Parkinson's patients
excerpt: We trained a feedforward neural network to prospectively identify sleep stage with PSG‐level accuracy from 30‐s epochs of LFP recordings in human PD patients
authors: Christensen, E; Abosch, A; Thompson, JA; Zylberberg, J

title: Models of primate ventral stream that categorize and visualize images
excerpt: We show that computational models that identify objects while also retaining enough information about the input image to allow its reconstruction, can provide a better description of how primate VS represents this category-orthogonal information, than do models that “just” identify objects
